content:
# The inventory check did not provide any information about my current position, indicating that the player position is still not being updated correctly.
# Since the movement commands have not resolved the issue, I will attempt to use the `nearest()` function to check for any nearby resources and see if this prompts an update in the environment.

# Finding the nearest resource to see if it triggers a position update.
nearest_resource = nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Looking for the nearest stone resource position.
print(f'Nearest stone position: {nearest_resource}')  # Outputting the nearest stone position.
